00022 #ifndef _CUMULATIVESTATS_H_
00023 #define _CUMULATIVESTATS_H_
00024 
00025 #include "portability/affy-base-types.h"
00026 #include "util/Err.h"
00027 //
00028 #include <algorithm>
00029 #include <cstring>
00030 #include <string>
00031 #include <vector>
00032 //
00033 
00034 //#include "stats/stats.h"
00035 
00036 /* Utility class for keeping track of summary statistics. */
00037 template <class T, class LargeNumber = double>
00038 class CumulativeStats {
00039 
00040   public:
00041   
00042   /** Constructor. */
00043   CumulativeStats() : m_Name(""), m_Counts(0),
00044   m_Max(0),     m_Min(0),
00045   m_Mean(0),    m_S(0), m_Full(false),
00046   m_Median(0), m_MedianTwo(0), m_IQR(0)
00047   {std::vector< LargeNumber > m_List;}
00048   
00049   /** Constructor. */
00050   CumulativeStats(const std::string &name) : m_Name(name), m_Counts(0),
00051   m_Max(0),     m_Min(0),
00052   m_Mean(0),    m_S(0), m_Full(false),
00053   m_Median(0), m_IQR(0)
00054   {std::vector< LargeNumber > m_List;}
00055   
00056   
00057   /** 
00058    * Add a vector of data, keeping a running tab of the mean, and
00059    * variance statistics. Algorithm from: Donald E. Knuth
00060    * (1998). The Art of Computer Programming, volume 2:
00061    * Seminumerical Algorithms, 3rd edn., p. 232. Boston:
00062    * Addison-Wesley.
00063    *
00064    * @param dat - New vector of data with one data point per chip.
00065    */
00066   void addData(T dat) {
00067     if(m_Counts == 0) 
00068     m_Min = m_Max = dat;
00069     else {
00070       m_Min = (std::min)(m_Min, dat);
00071       m_Max = (std::max)(m_Max, dat);
00072     }
00073     m_Counts++;
00074     T delta = dat - m_Mean;
00075     m_Mean += delta / m_Counts;
00076     m_S += delta * (dat - m_Mean);
00077     if (m_Full == true){
00078       m_List.push_back(dat);
00079     }
00080   }
00081 
00082   /* Complains if full method is not specified
00083    * Complains if less than 20 data points are provided
00084    * Computes median and IQR
00085    */
00086   void setUpFullMethod() {
00087     // wasnt set up to produce median and IQR.
00088     if (m_Full != true) {
00089       Err::errAbort("CumulativeStats::setUpFullMethod(): "
00090                     "You need to set your CumulativeStats object "
00091                     "to full method for getting median");
00092     }
00093     // to few points to be meaningful.
00094     if (m_List.size() < 20) {
00095       Err::errAbort("CumulativeStats::setUpFullMethod(): "
00096                     "You need to have at least 20 numbers "
00097                     "("+ToStr(m_List.size())+" given) "
00098                     "to compute fullMethod statistics (median, IQR, etc.) ");
00099     }
00100     // ...to many to handle.
00101     if (m_List.size() > 50000) {
00102       Err::errAbort("CumulativeStats::setUpFullMethod: "
00103                     "You have more than 50000 points,"
00104                     "is this too much? "+ToStr(m_List.size()));
00105     }
00106 
00107     
00108     std::sort(m_List.begin(), m_List.end());
00109     int quartile_ix = (m_List.size() / 4);
00110     int third_ix = quartile_ix + quartile_ix;
00111     m_IQR = m_List[third_ix] - m_List[quartile_ix];
00112     int odd = m_List.size() % 2;
00113     if (odd == 0) { //even
00114       m_Median = (m_List[(m_List.size() /2)] +m_List[(m_List.size()/2)-1])/2;
00115     }
00116     else {
00117       m_Median = m_List[(m_List.size() /2)];
00118     }
00119   }
00120   
00121   /* Accessors. */
00122   inline LargeNumber getStdev() { return static_cast<LargeNumber>(sqrt(m_S / (m_Counts - 1))); } 
00123   inline LargeNumber getMean() { return static_cast<LargeNumber>(m_Mean); } 
00124   inline T getMax() { return m_Max; }
00125   inline T getMin() { return m_Min; }
00126   inline void setFull(){ m_Full = true;}
00127   inline uint64_t getCount() { return m_Counts; }
00128   inline std::string getName() { return m_Name; }
00129   inline LargeNumber getMedian() { return static_cast<LargeNumber>(m_Median);}
00130   inline LargeNumber getIQR() { return static_cast<LargeNumber>(m_IQR);}
00131 
00132   private:
00133   
00134   std::string m_Name; ///< Name for this cumulative statistic.
00135   uint64_t m_Counts;  ///< How many examples have been seen.
00136   T m_Max;            ///< Maximum value seen.
00137   T m_Min;            ///< Minimum value seen.
00138   LargeNumber m_Mean; ///< Running mean calculation.
00139   LargeNumber m_S;    ///< Running variance calculation, divide by (n-1) for actual variance.
00140   bool m_Full;          ///< boolean for using full method or sparse
00141   std::vector<T> m_List;
00142   LargeNumber m_Median;
00143   LargeNumber m_MedianTwo;
00144   LargeNumber m_IQR;
00145 };
00146 
00147 #endif /* _CUMULATIVESTATS_H_ */
